member.param: The user ID to search for.

member.summary: Finds and returns the claims identity, if any, who has the specified normalized user name.
member.param: The normalized user name to search for.

member.summary: Finds user. If authentication is success creates a claims-based identity.
member.param: The identity of the user principal. This parameter can be any format that is contained in the enumeration.

member.name: M:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ActiveDirectoryClaimsStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContextOptions
member.summary: Represents of principal context options.

member.name: P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContextOptions.ContextType
member.summary: Specifies the type of store to which the principal belongs.

member.name: P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContextOptions.Name
member.summary: The name of the domain or server for context types, the machine name for context types, or the name of the server and port hosting the instance. If the name is null for a context type this context is a domain controller for the domain of the user principal under which the thread is running. If the name is null for a context type, this is the local machine name. This parameter cannot be null for context types.

member.name: P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContextOptions.Container
member.summary: The container on the store to use as the root of the context. All queries are performed under this root, and all inserts are performed into this container. For and context types, this parameter is the distinguished name of a container object. For context types, this parameter must be set to null.

member.name: P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContextOptions.ContextOptions
member.summary: A combination of one or more enumeration values the options used to bind to the server. If this parameter is null, the default options are | | .

member.name: P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContextOptions.Username
member.summary: The username used to connect to the store. If the username and password parameters are both null, the default credentials of the current principal are used. Otherwise, both username and password must be non-null, and the credentials they specify are used to connect to the store.

member.name: P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContextOptions.Password
member.summary: The password used to connect to the store. If the username and password parameters are both null, the default credentials of the current principal are used. Otherwise, both username and password must be non-null, and the credentials they specify are used to connect to the store.

member.name: T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContextValidateOptions
member.summary: Represents the validation class for .

member.summary: Validates a specific named options instance (or all when name is null).
member.param: The name of the options instance being validated.
